title: Michael Jackson - Xscape (2014) Deluxe Edition
description: Year: 2014 Genre: Pop, Soul, Electronic, Synthpop Label: MJJ / Epic / Sony Music Catalog Number: 88843066762 Country: EU Duration: 1:13:32 Type rip: Tracks +. Cue Codec: FLAC Bitrate: Lossless Availability scans in contents distribution: yes Description: Xscape - the twelfth studio album by Michael Jackson, which was released on May 9, 2014 via Epic in Germany, Spain and Poland. The record includes eight previously unreleased songs of the musician that producers record company Epic Records selected from the archive records of Jackson. Album went on sale in two versions. In the regular version will include songs in modern processing producers, as a deluxe edition of their original demos and complement the two videos. Tracklist: 01. Love Never Felt So Good - 3:54 02.
